titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Ready Reference Collection RG.040
titlestmt.author: Zoe Blecher-Cohen

publicationstmt.publisher: Poly Archives at the Bern Dibner Library of Science and Technology, NYU Libraries

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2023-08-22 10:07:49 -0400.

change.item: Finding aid revised and edited by Zoe Blecher-Cohen, Mandy Abokhair, and Aileen Thong in 2021 to update the institutional change from NYU-Poly to NYU and for compliance with DACS Required Elements for Archival Description.

repository.corpname: Poly Archives at the Bern Dibner Library of Science and Technology, NYU Libraries

did.physloc: Bern Dibner Library of Science and Technology 5 MetroTech Center Brooklyn, New York, 11201 (646) 997-3943 polyarchives@nyu.edu

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The collection covers people, places, and institutions that relate to Polytechnic in a variety of ways. This includes material about staff and alumni, current and former departments or locations, and records of different groups and events at Poly.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The folders in the collection are arranged alphabetically with the relevant portion of the title in asterisks if not the first text.
Individuals not identified by individually titled folders may have related materials in the "People" alphabetical folders.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Materials are open for research without restriction.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Permission to publish materials must be obtained from:
Poly Archives Bern Dibner Library of Science and Technology 5 MetroTech Center, Brooklyn, NY 11201

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date; Ready Reference Collection; RG 040; box number; folder number or item identifier; Poly Archives at Bern Dibner Library of Science and Technology, New York University.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Materials found in collection; there is no documentation concerning the provenance of these materials.
